comment.author: 55517947@N02
comment._content: This is not a Sister of Mercy. She is a Sister of Charity.

comment.author: 37206071@N03
comment._content: Isn't this the habit for the Sisters of Charity founded by Saint Elizabeth Ann Seton? (http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Elizabeth_Ann_Seton) Habits for the Sisters of Mercy are much different as seen on gothicgarments.com: bit.ly/nXLHB0
